defined_text = {
    name = OPERATION_NATION_DATE
    text = {
        localization_key = "SPECIAL_OPERATION_NATION_DATE"
    }
}
defined_text = {
    name = GetNetworkStatus
    text = {
        trigger = {
            check_variable = {
                espionage_network_status^generic_operations_selected_target = 1
            }
        }
        localization_key = "NETWORK_ACTIVE_TITLE"
    }
    text = {
        trigger = {
            check_variable = {
                espionage_network_status^generic_operations_selected_target = 0
            }
        }
        localization_key = "NETWORK_INACTIVE_TITLE"
    }
}
defined_text = {
    name = GetCountryBG
    text = {
        trigger = {
            tag = SOV
        }
        localization_key = "GFX_agency_logo_sov_bg"
    }
    text = {
        trigger = {
            tag = USA
        } 
        localization_key = "GFX_agency_logo_usa_bg"
    }
    text = {
        trigger = {
            NOT = { tag = SOV }
            NOT = { tag = USA }
        }
        localization_key = "GFX_agency_logo_usa_bg"
    }
}

defined_text = {
    name = GetInsurgentStatus
    text = {
        trigger = {
            check_variable = {
                insurgency_active = 1
            }
        }
        localization_key = "INSURGENTS_ACTIVE_TITLE"
    }
    text = {
        trigger = {
            check_variable = {
                insurgency_active = 0
            }
        }
        localization_key = "INSURGENTS_INACTIVE_TITLE"
    }
}

defined_text = {
    name = GetBlackOpsAgencyTitle
    #Else
    text = {
        trigger = {
            NOT = { tag = USA }
            NOT = { tag = SOV }
        }
        localization_key = "Black Operations"
    }
    text = {
        trigger = {
            tag = USA
        }
        localization_key = "Special Activities Division"
    }
    text = {
        trigger = {
            tag = SOV
        }
        localization_key = "First Main Directorate of the MGB"
    }

    

}

    name = NAME_SELECTOR

        trigger = {
            check_variable = {

            }

defined_text = {
    name = GetBlackOpsOperationDescPhase1
    text = {
        trigger = { 
            check_variable = { show_gladio = 2 } 
            check_variable = { selected_operation_index = 351 }
        }
        localization_key = "PHASE_1_Operation_DESC_GLADIO_1"
    }
